title: Drawing, "Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza;", 1802–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink: on the two statue bases: ALCIB/ and PITA/ GOR; lower center: il Preto[---] Petilio abrucia li libri/ di numa del comizio
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza;", 1802–05.
1802–05. Pen and brown ink, brown wash, over black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3459.
